name: tidal-controller
title: Tidal Controller
description:
Control your local Tidal client with your keyboard.
Note: You **must** enable Accessibility permissions for Raycast in order for this extension to work.
author: broc-dev

commands.name: play-pause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.description: Toggles the play/pause state of your current song on Tidal.

commands.name: next-song
commands.title: Next Track
commands.description: Plays the next song in Tidal.

commands.name: prev-song
commands.title: Previous Track or Restart Track
commands.description: Plays the previous song in Tidal, or restarts the current song if it's already playing.

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause Track
commands.description: Pauses the current song in Tidal.

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play Track
commands.description: Plays the current song in Tidal.

commands.name: shuffle
commands.title: Toggle Shuffle
commands.description: Toggles on shuffle mode in Tidal.

preferences.name: showMessages
preferences.label: Show Messages
preferences.title: Show Messages
preferences.description: Show pop up messages when an action is performed, such as toggling play/pause. Will also show a message if the action fails for some reason. No messages will be shown (even errors) if this is disabled.

preferences.name: language
preferences.label: Choose Language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Choose the language of the menu options.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
